e: ￹`Nano~ `to'as~ `ira~ `ko~ `ma~`tiniay~ `a~ `pi~`nangan~ `niyam~.￺From old times / antiquity we have had this kind of custom.￻從古代我們就有這種習慣
￹`O~ `ma~`to'as~`ay~ `cingra~.￺He is an old man / a man to be respected.￻他是老人家/是可敬的人
￹`Ma~`to'as~ `to~ `ko~ `wawa~ `iso~ `anini~.￺Your child has grown up.￻你的孩子已經長大了
￹`O~ `sa~`mato'asay~ `niyam~ `cingra~.￺He is our oldest member.￻他是我們年紀最大的
d.f: ￹￺to grow up * to mature￻成熟，成長
